function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exacerbation of existing inequalities and inequities due to COVID-19 impact","Impact":"Worsening of socio-economic and health disparities, leading to increased vulnerability of marginalized groups","Mitigation":"Implement targeted support programs, improve access to healthcare, and address social and economic disparities","Technologies":"Healthcare technology, community support platforms, data analytics for identifying vulnerable groups","People":"Women, racial minorities, immigrants, low-income residents, children, youth, the elderly, the homeless","Owner":"Government, public health organizations, community support groups"},{"Description":"Access to green spaces and public recreational areas disproportionately limited for vulnerable groups","Impact":"Limited opportunities for outdoor recreation and relief from living conditions, exacerbating feelings of isolation and loneliness","Mitigation":"Invest in creating and maintaining green spaces in lower-income neighborhoods, improve accessibility to public recreational areas","Technologies":"Urban planning technology, community engagement platforms, geospatial analysis for identifying underserved areas","People":"Low-income residents, children, youth, the elderly","Owner":"Local government, urban planners, community organizations"},{"Description":"Increased risk of domestic abuse due to lockdowns and stay-at-home orders","Impact":"Escalation of domestic abuse cases, leading to physical and psychological harm for victims","Mitigation":"Ensure access to safe spaces and support services, increase awareness and monitoring of domestic abuse cases","Technologies":"Emergency response systems, counseling and support platforms, data analysis for identifying at-risk individuals","People":"Women, victims of domestic abuse","Owner":"Law enforcement agencies, social service organizations, community support groups"}]}
